name: Friendly Sphinx Kitten
text: If this card is Flip Summoned, you can Special Summon 1 "Exxod, Master of The Guard" or 1 "Sphinx" monster in face-down Defense Position from your Deck ignoring summoning conditions. (Quick Effect): If this card is face-down, you can flip it face up, and if you do send this card to the GY, draw 2 cards. You can only use each effect of "Friendly Sphinx Kitten" once per turn.
